meanings.definition: To taste or savor food or drink carefully in order to appreciate its flavor.
meanings.sent1: She was degusting the soup to fully enjoy its rich taste.
meanings.sent2: I always degust the coffee before adding any sugar.
meanings.sent3: The chef degusted the dish with such focus, it seemed like a form of meditation.
meanings.sent4: Her way of degusting the wine was like deciphering a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Degusting the chocolate slowly revealed its hidden layers of flavor.

meanings.definition: The act of tasting or sampling food or drink to evaluate its quality.
meanings.sent1: His degusting of the cheese helped him decide which one to buy.
meanings.sent2: The degusting of the new wine was a fun experience for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The competition involved a blind degusting of various desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her degusting of the tea was like a scientific experiment in a lab.
meanings.sent5: The degusting of the cake revealed its true quality to the judges.
